<file>
00001| /** @type {import('next').NextConfig} */
00002| const nextConfig = {
00003|   images: { unoptimized: true },
00004|   
00005|   // EMERGENCY: DISABLE STRICT MODE 
00006|   reactStrictMode: false,
00007|   
00008|   // EMERGENCY: DISABLE SSR GLOBALLY IN DEV
00009|   ...(process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production' && {
00010|     experimental: {
00011|       runtime: 'nodejs',
00012|       serverActionsBodySizeLimit: '2mb',
00013|     }
00014|   }),
00015|   
00016|   // EMERGENCY: CUSTOM WEBPACK CONFIG
00017|   webpack: (config, { buildId, dev, isServer, defaultLoaders, webpack }) => {
00018|     if (dev) {
00019|       // Disable caching in development
00020|       config.cache = false;
00021|       
00022|       // Add aggressive error handling
00023|       config.resolve.fallback = {
00024|         ...config.resolve.fallback,
00025|         fs: false,
00026|         net: false,
00027|         tls: false,
00028|       };
00029|       
00030|       // Disable chunk splitting in dev
00031|       config.optimization = {
00032|         ...config.optimization,
00033|         splitChunks: false,
00034|         runtimeChunk: false,
00035|       };
00036|       
00037|       // Add error handler plugin
00038|       config.plugins.push(
00039|         new webpack.DefinePlugin({
00040|           'process.env.FORCE_NO_CACHE': JSON.stringify('true'),
00041|         })
00042|       );
00043|     }
00044|     
00045|     return config;
00046|   },
00047|   
00048|   // Добавляем заголовки для предотвращения кэширования
00049|   async headers() {
00050|     return [
00051|       {
00052|         source: '/(.*)',
00053|         headers: [
00054|           {
00055|             key: 'Cache-Control',
00056|             value: (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development' || process.env.NODE_ENV === undefined)
00057|               ? 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate, proxy-revalidate, s-maxage=0'
00058|               : 'public, max-age=3600',
00059|           },
00060|           {
00061|             key: 'Pragma',
00062|             value: 'no-cache',
00063|           },
00064|           {
00065|             key: 'Expires',
00066|             value: '0',
00067|           },
00068|         ],
00069|       },
00070|     ];
00071|   },
00072| };
00073| 
00074| module.exports = nextConfig;
00075| 
</file>
state.title: next.config.js
